title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Deck Saloon", ca. 1934–35
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at center: Deck Saloon; upper left, circled: c. table 28"; dimensions in graphite, lower left; instructions in graphite.
description: Plan and elevations of deck saloon on Lady Esther Yacht. Circular staircase on north wall at far left; Capehart radio-phonograph to right of staircase with tub chair and circular end table. Loveseat at right, perpendicular to north wall and facing the Capehart. Cabinet and desk directly behind loveseat, and bookshelves along north and east wall at far right (suggested mural above bookshelves on east wall). Card table and four chairs in front of bookshelves. Large bathroom on east wall toilet and sink near north wall, two showers at center, and closet near south wall. Bar with rounded front corners at far right on south wall. Three-seat sofa flanked by end tables and chair along center of south wall.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Deck Saloon", ca. 1934–35.
ca. 1934–35. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-424.
